description: The tmnxPppoeSessionFailure notification indicates that
the system could not create a new PPPoE session in the
tmnxPppoeSessionTable. The problem is described in the
object tmnxPppoeSessionFailureReason.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-PPPOE-MIB::tmnxPppoeSessionFailure TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId u 9999 TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapPortId u 9999 TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapEncapValue u 9999 TIMETRA-PPPOE-MIB::tmnxPppoeSessionFailureReason s EXAMPLE

description: The value of the object svcId specifies the Service identifier. This
value should be unique within the service domain.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId

description: The ID of the access port where this SAP is defined.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapPortId

description: The value of the label used to identify this SAP on the access port
specified by sapPortId.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapEncapValue

description: The object tmnxPppoeSessionFailureReason indicates the
problem encountered by the system while trying to create
a new PPPoE session in the tmnxPppoeSessionTable.
variables.name: TIMETRA-PPPOE-MIB::tmnxPppoeSessionFailureReason

description: The tmnxPppoeNcpFailure notification indicates that
there is a NCP phase setup problem.

event.Summary: NCP phase setup problem occurred due to $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-PPPOE-MIB::tmnxPppoeNcpFailure TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId u 9999 TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapPortId u 9999 TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapEncapValue u 9999 TIMETRA-PPPOE-MIB::tmnxPppoeNcpFailureProtocol i 1 TIMETRA-PPPOE-MIB::tmnxPppoeNcpFailureReason s EXAMPLE

description: The value of the object svcId specifies the Service identifier. This
value should be unique within the service domain.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId

description: The ID of the access port where this SAP is defined.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapPortId

description: The value of the label used to identify this SAP on the access port
specified by sapPortId.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapEncapValue

description: The value of tmnxPppoeNcpFailureProtocol indicates the
failing NCP protocol.
variables.name: TIMETRA-PPPOE-MIB::tmnxPppoeNcpFailureProtocol

description: The object tmnxPppoeNcpFailureReason indicates the
problem encountered by the system during NCP phase.
variables.name: TIMETRA-PPPOE-MIB::tmnxPppoeNcpFailureReason
